title: Mozilla's Responsible AI Challenge won by tech that protects images from AI
description: The Responsible AI Challenge, Mozilla's latest initiative to invest in responsible AI tech, has announced three winners.

title: Does No Man's Sky's pre-WWDC Mac debut hint that Apple is getting serious about gaming?
description: Mac gamers just got a big new game to try, but is this just the beginning of a newfound focus on gaming for Apple?

title: Google’s new June feature update has something for everyone
description: Google's June Android feature drop is here with updates to emoji, payments, and more.

title: Oculus Quest 2 gets a big price cut thanks to the Quest 3 reveal
description: The Oculus Quest 2 is back down to its lowest-ever price following the Quest 3's announcement, so it's a great time to buy one.

title: A critical security flaw is affecting Zyxel firewall devices - here's what you need to know
description: The vulnerability allows for remote code execution, but a patch is available.

title: Sonic creator Yuji Naka faces two years in prison for latest insider trading arrest
description: Yuji Naka, Sonic the Hedgehog co-creator, has been hit with jail time and a hefty fine following his arrest for insider trading.

title: Windows 11 is finally great for gamers again thanks to this new feature
description: Microsoft's Dev Home app has tools that are great for gamers who want to monitor their components in one simple place.

title: Xbox App for Windows is making PC gaming more accessible
description: New Xbox App puts accessibility front and center – and helps you find the games you want to play.

title: Whoops – did MSI just reveal the world’s first next-gen Intel laptop at Computex?
description: The MSI Prestige 16 Studio is the first laptop we've seen using one of Intel’s 14th-gen processors, but Intel didn't reveal it.

title: Amazon wants to be the provider of your cybersecurity response tools
description: Ten AWS regions can now pool their security data from cloud, on-, and off-prem into Amazon’s Security Lake.

title: Gamers are being targeted by more dangerous malware
description: Hackers are selling malware under the guise of legit software, targeting mostly the gaming community.

description: New rumors suggest Apple’s WWDC 2023 could feature a range of new Macs, as well as the VR headset.

description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg has given us our first look at the Meta Quest 3 VR headset; a follow-up to the Oculus Quest 2.

title: Reddit follows Twitter in killing off good apps with monstrous fees
description: Reddit has copied Twitter’s decision to squeeze developers via API fees, throwing third-party apps into uncertainty.

title: Many SMBs say they won't be able to pay their rent this year
description: Pre-pandemic revenues and profits are a far reach as many US SMBs struggle to keep up with rent.

title: Move over, Roomba: the new Ecovacs Deebot is smarter, higher, and hotter

title: This dangerous malware spoofs top Android apps to infect your device - here's how to stay safe
description: Don't download the YouTube Android app from a third-party source or a Telegram group - it's almost definitely malware.

description: Protests broke out at Amazon’s offices yesterday, with more workers joining remotely, as workers expressed their dissatisfaction.

description: Apple's VR headset is set to come with a sleek curved design according to rumors, but there's concern that this might have some durability problems.

title: Millions of Gigabyte motherboards were sold with a firmware backdoor flaw - see if you're affected

title: The country with the best cybersecurity skills may surprise you
